name: island survival clicker (android/windows)
description:
this game/experiment was an idea i  got and implemented.

the game is text-based with a lot of buttons.

the story is simple your marooned on an unknown island, you must build/craft a longboat, and there's zombies to make it harder.

the game loop is simple, click the button for points buy upgrades, collect resources craft tools and items until you are able to craft a longboat.

the game has instructions, but if anything is unclear, you found a bug, want a feature contact me.

its a 30 minute game (more or less).

to start a new game(in case you messed up everything) close the app reopen and press start game.

on mobile play on landscape mode.

on the web version play on full-screen mode (F11)

made with app game kit , a great tool for game dev.
